title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program for Working Professionals Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Project-based blended learning courses for workplace language skill enhancement linked to job tasks, conducted in digitally equipped environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve intermediate-level language proficiency in work-related topics (meetings, report writing, email composition, etc.)
Learners autonomously develop and execute learning plans by integrating digital learning platforms with in-person instruction
Learners demonstrate language application skills transferable to real-world work environments through team project execution
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
